def_en: You can refer to an activity or movement that has suddenly become fashionable or popular as a bandwagon .

def_cn: （尤指政客顺应的）时髦，潮流
def_en: If someone, especially a politician, jumps or climbs on the bandwagon, they become involved in an activity or movement because it is fashionable or likely to succeed and not because they are really interested in it.
